name: Pellet Pilots
description:
No skies are safe from the sky pirates. Journey forth with our red and blue adventurers in a quest to one day rid the skies of this menace.

Red can absorb red bullets and Blue can absorb blue bullets.  By using this ability you can gain fire power and fire back what's dealt to you.

Team:
TheStoff - 3D Modelling, Art Concept, UI
CurdleGames - Design, Programming and 3D Modelling
Mr_Afroduck - Enemy Programming
StraightUpGruntled - Music
